definitions.text: financial resources provided to make some project possible
examples: the foundation provided support for the experiment

definitions.text: convert (short-term floating debt) into long-term debt that bears fixed interest and is represented by bonds
place or store up in a fund for accumulation
provide a fund for the redemption of principal or payment of interest
accumulate a fund for the discharge of a recurrent liability

examples: The government funds basic research in many areas
